name: Mermaid's Mural
description:
Summary

Help the mermaid create her mural. Find the mural piece scattered across the map, and bring them to the mural area. You must have two symmetrical pieces to place them on the mural and your inventory is limited, so grab the pieces carefully. Remember you can always drop pieces.

This game was created for the Godot Wild Jam #47

Created by Cadoink, Bailie, and Jeremy. All music created by Jeremy. The idea was created by Emilie!

Controls

The best way to move is to hold W and then move the mouse to aim to where you want to go. ASD are mainly to make minor adjustments. 

  • WASD to swim.
  • Mouse to control the camera
  • Tab to show the menu
  • 1/2/3 to either drop pieces or select pieces if you are in the mural area.
Theme
